sn52.1:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma anuruddho savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn52.1:1.3: Atha kho ayasmato anuruddhassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn52.1:1.4: “yesam kesanci cattaro satipatthana viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn52.1:1.5: Yesam kesanci cattaro satipatthana araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami”ti.
sn52.1:2.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano ayasmato anuruddhassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—ayasmato anuruddhassa sammukhe paturahosi.
sn52.1:2.2: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn52.1:2.3: “kittavata nu kho, avuso anuruddha, bhikkhuno cattaro satipatthana araddha honti”ti?
sn52.1:3.1: “Idhavuso, bhikkhu ajjhattam kaye samudayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattam kaye vayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattam kaye samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:3.2: Bahiddha kaye samudayadhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha kaye vayadhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha kaye samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:3.3: Ajjhattabahiddha kaye samudayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha kaye vayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha kaye samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:4.1: So sace akankhati: ‘appatikule patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:4.2: sace akankhati: ‘patikule appatikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:4.3: sace akankhati: ‘appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:4.4: sace akankhati: ‘patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:4.5: sace akankhati: ‘appatikulanca patikulanca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyyam sato sampajano’ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajano.
sn52.1:5.1: Ajjhattam vedanasu samudayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattam vedanasu vayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattam vedanasu samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:5.2: Bahiddha vedanasu samudayadhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha vedanasu vayadhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha vedanasu samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:5.3: Ajjhattabahiddha vedanasu samudayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha vedanasu vayadhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha vedanasu samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:6.1: So sace akankhati: ‘appatikule patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:6.2: sace akankhati: ‘patikule appatikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:6.3: sace akankhati: ‘appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:6.4: sace akankhati: ‘patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati;
sn52.1:6.5: sace akankhati: ‘appatikulanca patikulanca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyyam sato sampajano’ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajano.
sn52.1:7.3: ajjhattabahiddha citte samudayadhammanupassi viharati … ajjhattabahiddha citte vayadhammanupassi viharati … ajjhattabahiddha citte samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi …pe… abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:8.1: So sace akankhati: ‘appatikule patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati …pe…
sn52.1:9.3: ajjhattabahiddha dhammesu samudayadhammanupassi viharati … ajjhattabahiddha dhammesu vayadhammanupassi viharati … ajjhattabahiddha dhammesu samudayavayadhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn52.1:10.1: So sace akankhati: ‘appatikule patikulasanni vihareyyan’ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati …pe…
sn52.1:10.3: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cattaro satipatthana araddha honti”ti.
